net.casper.io.file.out

Class CExportCSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.io.file.out.CExportCSV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.casper.data.model.CExporter

    public class CExportCSV
extends Object
implements net.casper.data.model.CExporter
    Exports a casper dataset to a CSV file.
    Version:
    $Revision: 147 $
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CExportCSV(File file)
      Construct a casper exporter that writes all columns in CSV format to file.
      CExportCSV(File file, String selectedColumnNames)
      Construct a casper exporter that writes the specified columns in CSV format to file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CExportCSV

        public CExportCSV(File file)
           throws IOException
        Construct a casper exporter that writes all columns in CSV format to file.
        Parameters:
        file - CSV file to create and write to.
        Throws:
        IOException - if problem creating file.

      • CExportCSV

        public CExportCSV(File file,
          String selectedColumnNames)
           throws IOException
        Construct a casper exporter that writes the specified columns in CSV format to file.
        Parameters:
        file - CSV file to create and write to.
        selectedColumnNames - the columns to write, or null to write all columns. Multiple columns are separated by commas, eg: "firstname,lastname" (NB: do not include a space after the comma).
        Throws:
        IOException - if problem creating file.
